thread.title: Pregnant woman wakes up with handprint on her belly after 'spirit' attack her in a dream
thread.title_full: Pregnant woman wakes up with handprint on her belly after 'spirit' attack her in a dream

author: Belinda Arthur
title: Pregnant woman wakes up with handprint on her belly after 'spirit' attack her in a dream
text:
Viral Gist
Pregnant woman wakes up with handprint on her belly after ‘spirit’ attack her in a dream
A pregnant woman has shown a strange bloody handprint on her belly after she claimed to have been slapped by a spirit in a dream.
The lady who is a resident of Grand Cape Mount County in Liberia disclosed in an interview with a Liberian journalist, Donso Sheriff how she woke up to the bloody handprint on her belly.
She disclosed to the journalist that she dreamt that a strange woman was trying to take her unborn baby from her and hence struggled with her in the dream.
“When I opened my eyes, my stomach was burning. When I looked down, there was a red handprint on my belly… and it was bleeding,” she recounted, her voice shaking,” she said.
After the handprint was spotted on her belly in the morning, her family rushed her to the hospital.
However, medical practitioners have yet to provide a scientific explanation, many residents concluded it was a spiritual attack.
